FUNC.NAME: signatureImageWidth
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the image width property of the signature decoder.

PARAM.NAME: signatureImageWidth
PARAM.DESC: The width of the desired output image. The barcode will be returned as a Data URI object with a jpeg mime type, you should specify the barcodeDataFormat and dataBufferSize parameters accordingly.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to specify the signatureImageWidth parameter
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="signature:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="signatureImageWidth:500"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="barcodeDataFormat:binary;dataBufferSize:5000"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

ADDITIONAL.PLATFORM: All supported devices except: Android devices.
ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner and device that supports the Signature decoder.
